subject: Baseball
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Atlanta Braves closer Craig Kimbrel was chosen the National League rookie of the year in a unanimous vote on Monday, and Tampa Bay pitcher Jeremy Hellickson was a clear winner in the American League.
snippet: Atlanta Braves closer Craig Kimbrel was chosen the National League rookie of the year in a unanimous vote on Monday, and Tampa Bay pitcher Jeremy Hellickson was a clear winner in the American League.
